rows.label: tlk70000034_03_msg0001
rows.name:
For a moment I wasn't sure what would
happen... But then I realized that's
exactly when you need music most.

rows.label: tlk70000034_03_msg0002
rows.name:
In desperate times, music has the
power to transcend words and speak
to the heart.

rows.label: tlk70000034_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm not strong enough to shift rubble,
but I CAN use music to lift the weight
of sorrow from people's hearts.

rows.label: tlk70000034_03_msg0004
rows.name:
If my music could ease the weight in
my dearest Sarah's heart - oh, what a
happy man I would be then!
